name: Chilly run
description:
It`s a 2d platformer with 8 levels now and you  have to complete them all to finish the game. It`s  my first project and I will be very thankful if you supported me by buying my game.

All music(NOT SFX) was written specially for this game and you can buy it separately if you want to use it in your own projects.

Hope you have fun!
